description:
Big enough to carry your camping equipment when bikepacking. A roll-closure at both ends lets you access your stuff fast. Keep a rain jacket at one end, and your tent at the other. The waterproof design is ideal for long adventures where getting caught in a rain storm is just a matter of time.

  • Waterproof polyurethane coated-nylon ripstop
  • IP64 waterproof rating stays dry through rainy weather
  • Hook-and-loop mounting straps with foam spacers for a perfect fit
  • Compression straps keeps the load nice and tight
  • Internal stiffener add stability
  • Highly reflective 3M scotchlite patches keeps you visible
  • Works with carbon handlebars
  • 4 alloy hooks are compatible with Ortlieb Accessory Pack (available separately)
  • Smaller size fits bikes with drop-bars; larger size fits flat bars and mountain bikes
name: Ortlieb Bikepacking Handlebar Pack
